trailingComments.value: Get/set the text of the layer.

leadingComments.value: Get/set the text of the layer.

trailingComments.value: Set the font of the layer to an NSFont object.

leadingComments.value: Set the font of the layer to an NSFont object.

trailingComments.value: Set the font of the layer to the system font at a given size.

leadingComments.value: Set the font of the layer to the system font at a given size.

trailingComments.value: Set the alignment of the layer.

leadingComments.value: Set the alignment of the layer.

trailingComments.value: Set the layer to be fixed width or variable width.

leadingComments.value: Set the layer to be fixed width or variable width.
